mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qrcode_merchant_user (qcid, eid, etp, longitude, latitude, createTime) SELECT #{qcid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{etp, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM qrcode_merchant_user WHERE qcid = #{qcid} AND eid = #{eid} AND etp = #{etp})
